Section on documentation reorganized

The siteâ€™s section on LaTeX documentation has been reorganized somewhat: the list of books has been moved to its own page, and the documentation stuff that used to be on the introduction page has been moved to where it belongs. Moreover, a new (French) book has been listed: Fontes et codages by Yannis Haralambous.
